router
Class Configuration.Link

java.lang.Object
  router.Configuration.Link
Enclosing class:
Configuration
public static class Configuration.Link
extends java.lang.Object

The Link class represents two ports and a metric that is defined in a configuration file.

Constructor Summary
Configuration.Link(int inputPort, int outputPort, int metric)
          Construct an Link from the given input-port, output-port and metric combination.
